metadata.title: CVE-2023-28370 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Open redirect vulnerability in Tornado versions 6.3.1 and earlier allows aremote unauthenticated attacker to redirect a user to an arbitrary web siteand conduct a phishing attack by having user access a specially craftedURL.

criterions.comment: python-tornado: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
